entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends who is talking to Hermione about the broom.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is another one of Harry's friends who is discussing the broom with Ron.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts and the recipient of the expensive broom.

entities.name: crookshanks
entities.description: Crookshanks is Ron's cat who suddenly appears and causes chaos.

entities.name: scabbers
entities.description: Scabbers is Ron's pet rat who tries to escape when Crookshanks attacks.

entities.name: seamus
entities.description: Seamus is a student at Hogwarts whose bed Crookshanks springs from.

entities.name: slytherins
entities.description: Slytherin is one of the four houses at Hogwarts.

relationships.description: Hermione is concerned about Harry's safety with the expensive broom.
Ron tries to protect Scabbers from Crookshanks.
Harry is the owner of the expensive broom.
Ron compares the cost of Harry's broom to that of all the Slytherin students' brooms combined.
